overview: Take a mesmerizing bird's-eye view through southern Ontario's beautiful Niagara region.  TRIPPING The Niagara starts high above Lake Ontario, flying through the charming streets of Niagara-on-the-Lake, soaring above Fort George, overabundant fruit orchards and vineyards, before dipping deep into the gorge to follow the churning emerald waters of the Niagara River to the world-famous Niagara Falls.
title: TRIPPING The Niagara
